description: Frigid temperatures won’t stop you from getting your turns. Designed for cold days in-bounds, the Macai delivers serious warmth and weather protection with a refined look. Insulated with RDS-certified European goose down, it keeps you comfortable - even during freezing lift rides - while breathable Gore-Tex sheds wind, rain, snow. The insulated DropHood™ can be removed on clear days, and mesh-backed PowderGuard™ vents let out excess heat without letting snow in.
name: Arcteryx Macai Jacket - Mens
